Deadpool for Constable | 2018

Deadpool is running for Fayette-County Constable. You may remember him from his presidential campaign in 2016. Since the defeat, he has lowered his sights and is looking to take any elected office he can win. We need your help to make this happen!

We believe Deadpool's values align with those of every demographic on a fundamental level. Because we are in politics, Deadpool also uses a lot of political jargon on the campaign. So you know he is for you!

The Issues

Pro

Tackling the real issues*
Stopping criminals*
County-Wide Taco Tuesdays
Being taken seriously

Against

Alternative Facts
The DC Universe
Drugs*
The new Taylor Swift

Items marked with an asterisk* indicate topics that we are only sometimes, or usually interested in.
